ApplicationId.description: The ID of the application that must be launched after the session starts.

FleetName.description: The fleet for which the URL is generated.

SessionContext.description: The sessionContext of the streaming URL.

StackName.description: The stack for which the URL is generated.

UserId.description: A unique user ID for whom the URL is generated.

Validity.description: The validity duration of the URL in seconds. After this duration, the URL returned by this operation becomes invalid.
